IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO PROVIDE, MAINTAIN, OPERATE, CONDUCT AND MANAGE A COMMUNITY HOUSE FOR THE GENERAL WELFARE OF LOCAL RESIDENTS FOR CHARITABLE AND EDUCATIONAL PURPOSES.
IRS990.MissionDesc: TO PROVIDE, MAINTAIN, OPERATE, CONDUCT AND MANAGE COMMUNITY HOUSE FOR THE GENERAL WELFARE OF LOCAL RESIDENTS FOR CHARITABLE AND EDUCATIONAL PURPOSES.
IRS990.Desc: COMMUNITY ACTIVITIES INCLUDING YOUTH, ADULT AND SENIOR PROGRAMS, THEATER AND FACILITY RENTAL

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: SOCIAL SERVICES INCLUDING COUNSELING, THERAPY FOR CHILDHOOD DISORDERS

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE COMMUNITY HOUSE FILES INCOME TAX RETURNS IN THE U.S. FEDERAL JURISDICTION AND ILLINOIS. WITH FEW EXCEPTIONS, THE COMMUNITY HOUSE IS NO LONGER SUBJECT TO U.S. FEDERAL, STATE AND LOCAL, OR NON-U.S. INCOME TAX EXAMINATIONS BY TAX AUTHORITIES FOR YEARS BEFORE 2020. THE COMMUNITY HOUSE DOES NOT HAVE ANY UNRECOGNIZED TAX BENEFITS AND DOES NOT EXPECT THIS TO CHANGE IN THE NEXT TWELVE MONTHS.

THE SCHOLARSHIP APPLICATION PROCESS INCLUDES THE SUBMISSION OF INFORMATION CONCERNING HOUSEHOLD INCOME. THE HOUSEHOLD INCOME IS COMPARED TO THE DUPAGE COUNTY MEDIAN HOUSEHOLD INCOME BY HOUSEHOLD SIZE. THIS INFORMATION ALONG WITH ANY OTHER UNDERLYING CIRCUMSTANCES, SUCH AS HIGH COST OF HEALTHCARE, SINGLE PARENT UNABLE TO WORK WITHOUT CHILDCARE AND ASSETS LOCKED IN DIVORCE, ARE USED TO DETERMINE THE AMOUNT OF SCHOLARSHIP TO BE AWARDED.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE 990 IS REVIEWED BY THE FINANCE COMMITTEE OR THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE OF THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY STATEMENT IS SIGNED ANNUALLY BY EACH TRUSTEE AND EMPLOYEE. THE STATEMENTS ARE PROVIDED TO THE GOVERNANCE COMMITTEE FOR REVIEW. ANY CONCERNS REGARDING POTENTIAL CONFLICTS ARE BROUGHT TO THE ATTENTION OF THE GOVERNANCE COMMITTEE. THE ACCOUNTING MANAGER AND EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR OF THE ORGANIZATION REVIEW ALL POTENTIAL CONFLICTS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ANNUAL REVIEWS ARE PERFORMED BY THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE FOR COST OF LIVING AND MERIT INCREASES. OTHER OFFICERS/KEY EMPLOYEES HAVE AN ANNUAL REVIEW PERFORMED WITH THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR WITH COST OF LIVING AND MERIT INCREASES GUIDANCE FROM THE FINANCE AND EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: GOVERNING DOCUMENTS ARE MADE AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST.
